column2: Disney has slammed the passage of the “Don’t Say Gay” bill in Florida and wants the law to be repealed after the state’s Republican governor Ron DeSantis officially signed the controversial legislation into law on Monday.
column4: Disney releases statement against Florida's "Don't Say Gay" bill

column2: Eisuke Sakakibara, Japan's former top currency diplomat, calls for the country to intervene or hike rates if the yen weakens past 130 per dollar, reports say.
column4: Japan’s yen keeps weakening against dollar, raising possible need for formal intervention
